alert.note: Alert for Texas (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 15 at 7:39PM CDT until May 15 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN DENT AND EAST CENTRAL TEXAS COUNTIES... At 739 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Licking to Raymondville to 9 miles east of Houston to 9 miles west of Summersville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Montauk State Park, Raymondville, Montauk, Yukon, Hartshorn, Prescott and Eunice. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
